    • startImpl

      protected abstract S startImpl() throws IOException
      抛出:
      IOException

    • readStatusFromDisk

      protected abstract S readStatusFromDisk()

    • start

      public S start()
      Read daemon status from disk, then try to start the daemon if the status file says it is stopped. Do nothing if the status read from disk says the daemon is running. After successfully starting the daemon (no exceptions from startImpl(), register a shutdown hook with the VM that will call killImpl(S) on shutdown.
      返回:
      status representing the daemon, either just-started or already running

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Read daemon status from disk, then try to kill the daemon if the status file says it is running. Do nothing if the status read from disk says the daemon is stopped.

    • runCommand

      public static void runCommand​(String... argv)
      Run the parameter as an external process. Returns if the command starts without throwing an exception and returns exit status 0. Throws an exception if there's any problem invoking the command or if it does not return zero exit status. Blocks indefinitely while waiting for the command to complete.
      参数:
      argv - passed directly to ProcessBuilder's constructor
